computed_styles.font-family: "Mona Sans", "Mona Sans Fallback", -apple-system, "system-ui", "Segoe UI", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

discovered_elements.purpose_of_the_element: Main hero heading that communicates GitHub's core value proposition about collaborative building

to_element_itself: font-size:56px, font-weight:440, color:#ffffff, text-align:center, line-height:61.6px, to_relevant_elements: overlaid on dark navy gradient background, high contrast white-on-dark

element_details.text_content: The future of building happens together

discovered_elements.purpose_of_the_element: Supporting paragraph that elaborates on the heading, explaining GitHub's role for developers and agents

relationships_to_other_elements.mimic_tips: to_element_itself: font-size:18px, font-weight:400, color:#ffffff, text-align:center, line-height:27px, margin-top:20px, max-width:600px, to_relevant_elements: 20px below hero-heading h1, centered horizontally
to_element_itself: font-size:18px, font-weight:400, color:#ffffff, text-align:center, line-height:27px, to_relevant_elements: 32px above the CtaForm row containing email input and buttons

element_details.text_content: Tools and trends evolve, but collaboration endures. With GitHub, developers, agents, and code come together on one platform.

discovered_elements.purpose_of_the_element: Horizontal flex row containing the email signup form and secondary CTA button

discovered_elements.purpose_of_the_element: White gradient container wrapping the email input field and sign-up button

key_elements_identified_from_screenshot.purpose: Large white heading 'The future of building happens together'
Supporting text about collaboration with GitHub
Light gray input with 'Enter your email' placeholder
Green primary CTA 'Sign up for GitHub'
Dark secondary CTA 'Try GitHub Copilot free' with white border
Dark navy gradient background (inherited from ancestor)
